titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to extend the deadline for the submission to the Federal Election Commission of campaign reports covering the first quarter of the calendar year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/10/1999--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to extend the deadline for submission to the Federal Election Commission of certain political committee quarterly reports.
